messages.text:
Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

I'd like you to review this change to
https://code.google.com/p/go

LGTM with the minor change in the case that TCPListener grows another private field in the future.

https://codereview.appspot.com/6875044/diff/4001/src/pkg/net/tcpsock_posix.go
File src/pkg/net/tcpsock_posix.go (right):

https://codereview.appspot.com/6875044/diff/4001/src/pkg/net/tcpsock_posix.go#newcode302
src/pkg/net/tcpsock_posix.go:302: return &TCPListener{fd}, nil
return &TCPListener{fd:fd}, nil

*** Submitted as https://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=c89043efd31c ***

net: simplify ListenTCP

R=golang-dev, dave
CC=golang-dev
https://codereview.appspot.com/6875044
